name: 09.12-Deeptools: MultiBigwigSummary
description: Given typically two or more bigWig files, computes the average scores for each of the files in every genomic region

parameters.name: Bw inputs
parameters.description: List of bigWig files, separated by spaces.

parameters.name: Ouput file
parameters.description: File name to save the coverage matrix. This matrix can be subsequently plotted using plotCorrelation or or plotPCA

parameters.name: BED
parameters.description: Limits the coverage analysis to the regions specified in these files.

parameters.name: Bins
parameters.description: The coverage calculation is done for consecutive bins of equal size (10 kilobases by default). This mode is useful to assess the genome-wide similarity of BAM files. The bin size and distance between bins can be adjusted.

parameters.name: BED-file
parameters.description: The user provides a BED file that contains all regions that should be considered for the coverage analysis. A common use is to compare ChIP-seq coverages between two different samples for a set of peak regions

parameters.name: Help
parameters.description: Show the help message and exit

parameters.name: Version
parameters.description: show program's version number and exit
